name: Subway Simulator 8 - Shanghai Edition
description:
Subway Simulator - now in Shanghai!
Miles and miles of intricate tunnels, high speed and punctuality - try Subway Simulator - Shanghai Edition and find out what it feels like to explore the city from under the ground!

HOW TO OPERATE:
You have the entire switch panel in your control. As soon as you arrive at a station, use the door button to make the doors open. Wait for the passengers to take their seats then use the door button again to close the doors. Now starts the journey!

Use the lever on the left to adjust the appropriate speed according to the signs. If you speed up too much, you will get a ticket. In the upper right corner there's a passenger counter. Take as many passengers as you can to gain the highest score. Don't forget to be punctual and don't miss a single station!

FEATURES:

Realistic simulation: you are in full control of the switch panel;
Amazing high-quality 3D graphics;
Beautiful stations to visit;
Smooth animations;
Passengers and tickets counter.
